alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 6:42PM EST until December 20 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at North Creek. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage and inundates low areas including portions of Old River Road upstream of the Route 28N bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.05 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River North Creek Flood Stage: 10.0 Observed Stage at Tue 6 pm: 10.0 Forecast: Tue 7 pm 10.2 Wed 1 am 9.6 Wed 7 am 9.1 Wed 1 pm 8.8 Wed 7 pm 8.4 Thu 1 am 8.0 Thu 7 am 7.5 Thu 1 pm 7.1 Thu 7 pm 6.7 Fri 1 am 6.3 Fri 7 am 6.0 Fri 1 pm 5.7 &&
